caption: Deshaun Watson
infobox-image: refer to caption | Watson with the Houston Texans in 2018

Career highlights and awards: 3× Pro Bowl (2018-2020) | NFL passing yards leader (2020) | PFWA All-Rookie Team (2017) | CFP national champion (2016) | CFP National Championship Offensive MVP (2016) | Best Male College Athlete ESPY Award (2017) | Johnny Unitas Golden Arm Award (2016) | 2× Davey O'Brien Award (2015, 2016) | 2× Manning Award (2015, 2016) | Consensus All-American (2015) | 2× ACC Athlete of the Year (2016, 2017) | ACC Player of the Year (2015) | ACC Offensive Player of the Year (2015) | First-team All-ACC (2015) | Second-team All-ACC (2016) | NFL records | Highest career completion percentage: 67.8% | Most completions with a perfect passer rating: 28
